snippet.title: Sanctity Gameplay Teaser Trailer | Arcanepunk Hack & Slash RPG | Unreal Engine
snippet.description:
To end a 200 year war against the Fae, God gifted humans with Technology. With their new technology, the humans decemated the Fae forces, subjugating them and building a world in God's name by deploying autonomous knights known as Paladins - one for each of the 7 elements; Fire, Water, Earth, Lightning, Light, Dark and Gravity. . Now at peace through technology, humans succumbed to stagnation.

They built their grand fortress cities, enslaved the Fae to do their bidding, and wollowed away their lives in debauchery and frivolity within God's Infinite Paradise system.

Thus has the world remained for centuries, stuck in an ever lasting cycle of stagnation. That was, until the Corrupted came.

Swiftly consuming the world, the Paladins struggling valiantly against the blasphemy of the Corrupted. But even the might of the Paladins could not stop the spread from reaching the Holy City…

----------------------------------------

Check out the gameplay teaser trailer for Sanctity; an Arcanepunk Hack & Slash RPG.

Hack, slash, gravity hook and wall run your way through the streets of Sanctaidd and the virtual worls of the Infinite Heavens system as you fight to protect mankind against the spread of the mysterious Corruption speading through the world.

Take on challenge runs in the Paladins' Training Simulator virtual world, help surviving citizens back to the Safe Zone, and uncover the truth behind both the Corruption and the strange, empty white world that has surfaced in the Infinite Heavens.

#indiegamedev #unrealengine #actionrpg 

-------------------------------------------
Music by Alexi Action
-------------------------------------------

Steam: Coming Soon!
Kickstarter Pre-Launch Page: https://www.bit.ly/sanctity-ks
Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/ilixxiegames
